where-to-go: Looking to get the most out of your desire to dance bachata, salsa and zouk in Medell√≠n? Schedule your dance week! Weekly agenda for dancers:
where-to-go-1: Monday: Start your week with energy at Blood Dance Company. Classes for all levels and social afterwards (Bachata class. Dance bachata, Salsa and zouk all night long).
where-to-go-2: Tuesday: Immerse yourself in the world of bachata at Nueva Guardia. Learn new steps and enjoy a night full of sensuality (Bachata class. Dance bachata all night long).
where-to-go-3: Wednesday: Mid-week, maximum fun! Majao offers a perfect mix of Latin rhythms for all tastes (Bachata class. Dance bachata, Salsa and zouk all night long).
where-to-go-4: Thursday: Get ready for the weekend at The Grand Social. Exclusive atmosphere and the best bachata DJ's in town (bachata class, dance bachata all night long).
where-to-go-5: Friday: Welcome to the weekend! Blood Dance Company awaits you with an explosion of Latin rhythms to dance until dawn (salsa class. Dance bachata and salsa all night long).
where-to-go-6: Saturday: The night is young at DanceFree. Come and enjoy the best bachata and salsa hits in a unique atmosphere (salsa and bachata class, dance bachata and salsa all night long).
where-to-go-7: Sunday: Close your week with a flourish at ZoukMedellin in the afternoon and CONEXION DANCE in the evening. Three styles, one passion: dancing!
